amendment.description: To provide for the restoration of certain plans terminating in 2003.

action.text: Amendment SA 2263 proposed by Senator Specter to Amendment SA 2233. (consideration: CR S296-297; text: CR S296) To provide for the restoration of certain plans terminating in 2003.
